Name: n_vision_indicator
Title: Rooftop Characterisation
Description: N Vision's rooftop charachterization capabilty provides efficient and accurate mapping of [solar panel installations](https://gtif-austria.info/narratives/solar_panel_mapping) and of [green roofs](https://gtif-austria.info/narratives/green-roof-mapping) in areas of interest by analysing satellite or aerial imagery using state-of-the-art computer vision methods.
